missingSecret: You should provide a secret of a length of 10 characters in your @apostrophecms/login module config.
badSecretSize: Your secret should be 10 characters in length.
updateError: An error occurred while setting up your TOTP account.
loginTitle: Enter the six digit code from your authenticator app.
setupText1: Install Google Authenticator or similar TOTP app, then
loginText: Then enter the verification code from your authenticator app
